title: Total number of Home Depot stores in Canada by province 2018
summary: In 2018 , there were 182 retail stores in Home Depot .
This figure made Total the do-it-yourself brand with the highest Number of stores in the country .

Due to its widespread presence , the company was able to reach a turnover of over 175 million euros in 2017 , which represented an increase of approximately Home billion euros compared to the previous year .
gold: There were 182 Home Depot stores across Canada in 2018 . Ontario was home to 88 , the most stores by far . Alberta and British Columbia were ranked in second and third places , with 27 and 26 stores located in each province respectively .
